Module org.softsmithy.lib.core
Package org.softsmithy.lib.nio.file

Class CopyFileVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.nio.file.SimpleFileVisitor<Path>
      • org.softsmithy.lib.nio.file.CopyFileVisitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileVisitor<Path>
    public class CopyFileVisitor
extends SimpleFileVisitor<Path>
    A FileVisitor which copies the source Path to the target Path.

    If the source is a directory, it content gets copied recursively.

    The source and the target don't have to be on the same file system and thus this class can be used to e.g. extract a directory from a jar/ zip file.
    Author:
    puce
    See Also:
    Files.walkFileTree(java.nio.file.Path, java.nio.file.FileVisitor), copy(java.nio.file.Path, java.nio.file.Path, java.nio.file.CopyOption...)

      • copy

        public static Path copy​(Path source,
                        Path target,
                        CopyOption... options)
                 throws IOException
        Copies the source to the target.

        If the source is a directory, its content gets copied recursively.

        The source and the target don't have to be on the same file system and thus this method can be used to e.g. extract a directory from a jar/ zip file.
        Parameters:
        source - the source
        target - the target
        options - the copy options
        Returns:
        the source
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error is thrown
